newsitem.title: USA: Aurora names Thompson COO, Withers CFO.
newsitem.headline: Aurora names Thompson COO, Withers CFO.

text.p: Aurora Electronics Inc. Wednesday named John Thompson to the post of president and chief operating officer and Wayne Withers to senior vice president and chief financial officer.
Previously, the post of president and chief financial officer was occupied by John Grazer, who left the firm last month.
In a statement, Aurora said both executives will be based in Aurora's corporate headquarters in San Diego, reporting to Aurora chairman and chief executive officer Jim Cowart.

Prior to joining Aurora, Thompson, 52, held the position of senior vice president worldwide operations for El Segundo, Calif.-based Merisel Inc a major distributor of computer accessories, software and peripherals with revenues exceeding $6 billion.

Prior to joining Aurora, Withers, 62 held the position of vice president and chief financial officer for PrimeSource Inc., one of the nation's largest independent wholesale distributors of building products.
Aurora provides computer original equipment makers and service organizations with spare parts distribution services and electronics recycling necessary for support of their worldwide installed base.
